lines.text: Why can't you sit up properly?
Next week - boom! - the world goes up in smoke. And what's the score? Zero!
Funny, only squares know where to go.
Love? That's the gimmick that makes sex respectable, isn't it!
You've got to live for the kicks. It's all you've got.
Great, dad, great. Straight from the fridge.
If you wanna fight, go and join the army, it's the place for squares.
What's the matter with you, boy, why do you need that? Drinks are for squares, man.
Go on, get out of here, you jiving, driveling scum.
He sends me over and out.
